meanings.definition: The quality or state of being pulpy.
meanings.sent1: The pulpinesses of the orange made it easy to squeeze out the juice.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the pulpinesses of fresh fruit in my smoothies.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the pulpinesses of the tomato sauce made it look like a science experiment.
meanings.sent4: The pulpinesses of the mashed bananas reminded her of fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent5: The pulpinesses of the paper towel soaked up the spilled water quickly.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a soft, moist, and slightly fibrous texture.
meanings.sent1: She appreciated the pulpinesses of the ripe peach as she took a juicy bite.
meanings.sent2: The pulpinesses of the sponge made it perfect for absorbing liquids.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's fur had the pulpinesses of a fluffy cotton ball.
meanings.sent4: The pulpinesses of the bread dough made it easy to shape into loaves.
meanings.sent5: The pulpinesses of the avocado made it ideal for spreading on toast.
